caption.title: Comparison of PadC kinetics of substrate conversion

tr.th: Comparison of initial rates* @ 200 µM GTP (µmol product min−1 µmol−1 enzyme2)

fn.p: *Comparison of product formation between the various constructs was performed for initial reaction rates at 200 µM GTP. Initial rates are quantified from experimental triplicates for three time points, and the sample standard deviation of individual points contributed to the error estimation of the linear fit that is used to calculate the initial rate of product formation. The SE of the estimate from the linear regression is used as error indicator.
